product.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
product.tagline: Brighten Up with Vitamin C Power
product.headline: Brighten Your Complexion with 10% Vitamin C GlowBoost Serum
product.description: Get ready to unlock a brighter, more even-toned complexion with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, expertly formulated with 10% Vitamin C to deliver unparalleled brightening benefits. This potent serum not only fades dark spots, but also deeply nourishes the skin with Hyaluronic Acid, leaving you with a radiant and healthy-looking glow. Perfect for oily and combination skin types, GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is the perfect addition to your skincare routine, providing a powerful and effective solution for a more luminous you. With its carefully crafted blend of ingredients, this serum is poised to revolutionize your skincare regimen and reveal your most radiant skin yet.

ingredient_details.name: Vitamin C
ingredient_details.description: A potent antioxidant that helps to brighten and even out skin tone, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while protecting the skin from environmental stressors.

ingredient_details.name: Hyaluronic Acid
ingredient_details.description: A naturally occurring humectant that retains moisture in the skin, providing long-lasting hydration and leaving the skin feeling soft, supple, and plump.

detailed_benefits.description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum helps to even out your skin tone, giving you a brighter and more radiant complexion by reducing dullness and promoting a healthy glow.
This serum effectively fades dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and acne scars, leaving your skin with a smoother and more uniform appearance, and a more even skin tone over time.

how_to_use.raw_instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
how_to_use.summary: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

steps: Apply 2-3 drops of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum to your face and neck in the morning
Gently massage the serum into your skin until fully absorbed
tips: Apply before sunscreen for optimal results
Avoid applying to broken or irritated skin

precautions: Discontinue use if irritation or mild tingling persists
Perform a patch test before using on the face
Avoid applying to broken or damaged skin
who_should_avoid: Those with known allergies to vitamin C or other serum ingredients
expanded_safety.storage: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight and out of reach of children
